pli-tv-kd11:1.1.2: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd11:1.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū attanā bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṃghe adhikaraṇakārakā, yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṃghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.1.6: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.1.9: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattanti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.1: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.2: “kathañhi nāma paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū attanā bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṃghe adhikaraṇakārakā, yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṃghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vakkhanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.5: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.8: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.9: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.10: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.11: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū attanā bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṃghe adhikaraṇakārakā, yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṃghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.14: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.17: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattantī”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.20: “ananucchavikaṃ, bhikkhave, tesaṃ moghapurisānaṃ ananulomikaṃ appatirūpaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ akappiyaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.21: Kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā attanā bhaṇḍanakārakā …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.22: saṃghe adhikaraṇakārakā, yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.23: saṃghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vakkhanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.26: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.29: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattanti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.30: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya pasannānaṃ vā bhiyyobhāvāya.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.31: Atha khvetaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānañceva appasādāya pasannānañca ekaccānaṃ aññathattāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.3.1: Atha kho bhagavā te bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya dupposatāya mahicchatāya asantuṭṭhitāya saṅgaṇikāya kosajjassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsitvā anekapariyāyena subharatāya suposatāya appicchassa santuṭṭhassa sallekhassa dhutassa pāsādikassa apacayassa vīriyārambhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitvā bhikkhūnaṃ tadanucchavikaṃ tadanulomikaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd11:1.3.2: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ karotu.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.2: Paṭhamaṃ paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū codetabbā, codetvā sāretabbā, sāretvā āpattiṃ āropetabbā, āpattiṃ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.4: Ime paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū attanā bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṃghe adhikaraṇakārakā, yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṃghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.7: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.10: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattanti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.11: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.15: saṃghe adhikaraṇakārakā, yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.16: saṃghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.19: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.22: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattanti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.24: Yassāyasmato khamati paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.29: saṃghe adhikaraṇakārakā, yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.30: saṃghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.33: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.36: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattanti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.38: Yassāyasmato khamati paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.43: saṃghe adhikaraṇakārakā, yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.44: saṃghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.47: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.50: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattanti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.52: Yassāyasmato khamati paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:1.4.55: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:2.1.1: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.

pli-tv-kd11:3.1.33: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca. #11

pli-tv-kd11:3.1.35: Āpattiṃ āropetvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:3.1.36: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca. #12
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, tajjanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.2: Bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.5: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, tajjanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #1
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.6: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, tajjanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.7: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.8: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, tajjanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #2
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.9: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, tajjanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.10: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, saṃghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:4.1.11: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, tajjanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #3
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.1: Tiṇṇaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, tajjanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.2: Eko bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.3: eko bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.5: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, tajjanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #4
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.6: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, tajjanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.7: Eko adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, eko ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, eko atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.8: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, tajjanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #5
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.9: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, tajjanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.10: Eko buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, eko dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, eko saṃghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.11: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, tajjanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #6
pli-tv-kd11:5.1.8: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena tajjanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:6.1.1: Atha kho saṃgho paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ akāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:6.1.2: Te saṃghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattanti, lomaṃ pātenti, netthāraṃ vattanti, bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:6.1.3: “mayaṃ, āvuso, saṃghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattāma, lomaṃ pātema, netthāraṃ vattāma, kathaṃ nu kho amhehi paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:6.1.6: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetu.
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.2: Upasampādeti, nissayaṃ deti, sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, bhikkhunovādakasammutiṃ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.5: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena tajjanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti taṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, aññaṃ vā tādisikaṃ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ;
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.8: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.9: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṃ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṃ karoti, anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṃ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.10: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.2: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṃ deti, na sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, na bhikkhunovādakasammutiṃ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo na ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.5: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena tajjanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti taṃ āpattiṃ na āpajjati, aññaṃ vā tādisikaṃ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ;
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.6: kammaṃ na garahati, kammike na garahati—
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.8: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.9: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṃ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṃ karoti, na anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṃ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.10: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:8.1.2: Tehi, bhikkhave, paṇḍukalohitakehi bhikkhūhi saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:8.1.3: ‘mayaṃ, bhante, saṃghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattāma, lomaṃ pātema, netthāraṃ vattāma, tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.2: Ime paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū saṃghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattanti, lomaṃ pātenti, netthāraṃ vattanti, tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācanti.
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.3: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambheyya.
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.6: Ime paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū saṃghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattanti, lomaṃ pātenti, netthāraṃ vattanti, tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācanti.
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.8: Yassāyasmato khamati paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.12: Ime paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū saṃghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattanti, lomaṃ pātenti, netthāraṃ vattanti, tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācanti.
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.14: Yassāyasmato khamati paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.18: Ime paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū saṃghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattanti, lomaṃ pātenti, netthāraṃ vattanti, tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācanti.
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.20: Yassāyasmato khamati paṇḍukalohitakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.23: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā seyyasako bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.3: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṃ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṃ dentā abbhentā.
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.4: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.5: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā seyyasako bālo bhavissati abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.7: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṃ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṃ dentā abbhentā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.8: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.9: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.10: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, seyyasako bhikkhu bālo abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.12: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṃ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṃ dentā abbhentā”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.15: “ananucchavikaṃ, bhikkhave, tassa moghapurisassa ananulomikaṃ appatirūpaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ akappiyaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.16: Kathañhi nāma so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso bālo bhavissati abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.18: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṃ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṃ dentā abbhentā.
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.22: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ karotu—
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.2: Paṭhamaṃ seyyasako bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṃ āropetabbo, āpattiṃ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.4: Ayaṃ seyyasako bhikkhu bālo abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.6: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṃ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṃ dentā abbhentā.
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.7: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.11: Ayaṃ seyyasako bhikkhu bālo abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.13: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṃ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṃ dentā abbhentā.
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.16: Yassāyasmato khamati seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassassa kammassa karaṇaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.22: Ayaṃ seyyasako bhikkhu bālo abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.24: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṃ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṃ dentā abbhentā.
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.27: Yassāyasmato khamati seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassassa kammassa karaṇaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.32: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.1: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṃ niyassakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.2: Asammukhā kataṃ hoti, appaṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, appaṭiññāya kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ niyassakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca. #1
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ niyassakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.5: Anāpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, desitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.6: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ niyassakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca. #2
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.7: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ niyassakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.8: Acodetvā kataṃ hoti, asāretvā kataṃ hoti, āpattiṃ anāropetvā kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.9: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ niyassakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca. #3
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.11: asammukhā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.14: appaṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.17: appaṭiññāya kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.20: anāpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.23: adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.26: desitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.29: acodetvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.32: asāretvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.34: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ niyassakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.35: Āpattiṃ anāropetvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.36: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ niyassakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca. #12
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.39: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṃ niyassakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.40: Sammukhā kataṃ hoti, paṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, paṭiññāya kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.41: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ niyassakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca. #1
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.42: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ niyassakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.43: Āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adesitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.44: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ niyassakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca. #2
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.45: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ niyassakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.46: Codetvā kataṃ hoti, sāretvā kataṃ hoti, āpattiṃ āropetvā kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.47: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ niyassakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca. #3
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.49: sammukhā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.52: paṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.55: paṭiññāya kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.58: āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.61: desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.64: adesitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.67: codetvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.70: sāretvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.72: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ niyassakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.73: Āpattiṃ āropetvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.74: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ niyassakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca. #12
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.77: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, niyassakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.78: Bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.81: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, niyassakammaṃ kareyya. #1
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.82: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, niyassakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.83: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.84: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, niyassakammaṃ kareyya. #2
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.85: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, niyassakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.86: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, saṃghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.87: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, niyassakammaṃ kareyya. #3
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.88: Tiṇṇaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, niyassakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.89: Eko bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.90: eko bālo hoti, abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.92: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, niyassakammaṃ kareyya. #4
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.93: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, niyassakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.94: Eko adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, eko ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, eko atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.95: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, niyassakammaṃ kareyya. #5
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.96: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, niyassakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.97: Eko buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, eko dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, eko saṃghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.98: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, niyassakammaṃ kareyya. #6
pli-tv-kd11:10.1.108: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena niyassakammaṃ kataṃ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:11.1.1: Atha kho saṃgho seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd11:11.1.3: So saṃghena niyassakammakato kalyāṇamitte sevamāno bhajamāno payirupāsamāno uddisāpento paripucchanto bahussuto hoti, āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd11:11.1.4: Sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd11:11.1.5: “ahaṃ, āvuso, saṃghena niyassakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṃ pātemi, netthāraṃ vattāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:11.1.9: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ paṭippassambhetu.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.2: Upasampādeti, nissayaṃ deti, sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, bhikkhunovādakasammutiṃ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.5: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena niyassakammaṃ kataṃ hoti taṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, aññaṃ vā tādisikaṃ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ;
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.8: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.9: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṃ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṃ karoti, anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṃ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.10: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.13: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.14: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṃ deti, na sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, na bhikkhunovādakasammutiṃ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo na ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.15: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.16: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.17: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena niyassakammaṃ kataṃ hoti taṃ āpattiṃ na āpajjati, aññaṃ vā tādisikaṃ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ;
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.18: kammaṃ na garahati, kammike na garahati—
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.19: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.20: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.21: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṃ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṃ karoti, na anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṃ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:11.2.22: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:12.1.2: Tena, bhikkhave, seyyasakena bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:12.1.3: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, saṃghena niyassakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṃ pātemi, netthāraṃ vattāmi, niyassassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.3: Ayaṃ seyyasako bhikkhu saṃghena niyassakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, niyassassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.4: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassakammaṃ paṭippassambheyya.
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.7: Ayaṃ seyyasako bhikkhu saṃghena niyassakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, niyassassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.9: Yassāyasmato khamati seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.13: Ayaṃ seyyasako bhikkhu saṃghena niyassakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, niyassassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.15: Yassāyasmato khamati seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.19: Ayaṃ seyyasako bhikkhu saṃghena niyassakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, niyassassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.21: Yassāyasmato khamati seyyasakassa bhikkhuno niyassassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:12.2.24: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena assajipunabbasukā nāma kīṭāgirismiṃ āvāsikā honti alajjino pāpabhikkhū.
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.3: mālāvacchaṃ ropentipi ropāpentipi, siñcantipi siñcāpentipi, ocinantipi ocināpentipi, ganthentipi ganthāpentipi, ekatovaṇṭikamālaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, ubhatovaṇṭikamālaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, mañjarikaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, vidhūtikaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, vaṭaṃsakaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, āveḷaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, uracchadaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi.
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.4: Te kulitthīnaṃ kuladhītānaṃ kulakumārīnaṃ kulasuṇhānaṃ kuladāsīnaṃ ekatovaṇṭikamālaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, ubhatovaṇṭikamālaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, mañjarikaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, vidhūtikaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, vaṭaṃsakaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, āveḷaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, uracchadaṃ harantipi harāpentipi.
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.5: Te kulitthīhi kuladhītāhi kulakumārīhi kulasuṇhāhi kuladāsīhi saddhiṃ ekabhājanepi bhuñjanti, ekathālakepi pivanti, ekāsanepi nisīdanti, ekamañcepi tuvaṭṭenti, ekattharaṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, ekapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, ekattharaṇapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, vikālepi bhuñjanti, majjampi pivanti, mālāgandhavilepanampi dhārenti, naccantipi, gāyantipi, vādentipi, lāsentipi;
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.6: naccantiyāpi naccanti, naccantiyāpi gāyanti, naccantiyāpi vādenti, naccantiyāpi lāsenti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.7: gāyantiyāpi naccanti, gāyantiyāpi gāyanti, gāyantiyāpi vādenti, gāyantiyāpi lāsenti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.8: vādentiyāpi naccanti, vādentiyāpi gāyanti, vādentiyāpi vādenti, vādentiyāpi lāsenti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.9: lāsentiyāpi naccanti, lāsentiyāpi gāyanti, lāsentiyāpi vādenti, lāsentiyāpi lāsenti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.2.1: aṭṭhapadepi kīḷanti, dasapadepi kīḷanti, ākāsepi kīḷanti, parihārapathepi kīḷanti, santikāyapi kīḷanti, khalikāyapi kīḷanti, ghaṭikāyapi kīḷanti, salākahatthenapi kīḷanti, akkhenapi kīḷanti, paṅgacīrenapi kīḷanti, vaṅkakenapi kīḷanti, mokkhacikāyapi kīḷanti, ciṅgulakenapi kīḷanti, pattāḷhakenapi kīḷanti, rathakenapi kīḷanti, dhanukenapi kīḷanti, akkharikāyapi kīḷanti, manesikāyapi kīḷanti, yathāvajjenapi kīḷanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.2.2: hatthismimpi sikkhanti, assasmimpi sikkhanti, rathasmimpi sikkhanti, dhanusmimpi sikkhanti, tharusmimpi sikkhanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.2.3: hatthissapi purato dhāvanti, assassapi purato dhāvanti, rathassapi purato dhāvantipi ādhāvantipi;
pli-tv-kd11:13.2.5: raṅgamajjhepi saṅghāṭiṃ pattharitvā naccakiṃ evaṃ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:13.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu kāsīsu vassaṃvuṭṭho sāvatthiṃ gacchanto bhagavantaṃ dassanāya yena kīṭāgiri tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd11:13.3.2: Atha kho so bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kīṭāgiriṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena, okkhittacakkhu iriyāpathasampanno.
pli-tv-kd11:13.3.4: “kvāyaṃ abalabalo viya mandamando viya bhākuṭikabhākuṭiko viya?
pli-tv-kd11:13.3.6: Amhākaṃ pana ayyā assajipunabbasukā saṇhā sakhilā sukhasambhāsā mihitapubbaṅgamā ehisvāgatavādino abbhākuṭikā uttānamukhā pubbabhāsino.
pli-tv-kd11:13.3.8: Addasā kho aññataro upāsako taṃ bhikkhuṃ kīṭāgirismiṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ;
pli-tv-kd11:13.3.9: disvāna yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ abhivādetvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.1: Atha kho so upāsako taṃ bhikkhuṃ gharaṃ netvā bhojetvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.3: “Sāvatthiṃ kho ahaṃ, āvuso, gamissāmi bhagavantaṃ dassanāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.4: “Tena hi, bhante, mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vanda, evañca vadehi—
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.6: Assajipunabbasukā nāma kīṭāgirismiṃ āvāsikā alajjino pāpabhikkhū.
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.8: mālāvacchaṃ ropentipi ropāpentipi, siñcantipi siñcāpentipi, ocinantipi ocināpentipi, ganthentipi ganthāpentipi, ekatovaṇṭikamālaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, ubhatovaṇṭikamālaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, mañjarikaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, vidhūtikaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, vaṭaṃsakaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, āveḷaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, uracchadaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi.
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.9: Te kulitthīnaṃ kuladhītānaṃ kulakumārīnaṃ kulasuṇhānaṃ kuladāsīnaṃ ekatovaṇṭikamālaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, ubhatovaṇṭikamālaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, mañjarikaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, vidhūtikaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, vaṭaṃsakaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, āveḷaṃ harantipi harāpentipi, uracchadaṃ harantipi harāpentipi.
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.10: Te kulitthīhi kuladhītāhi kulakumārīhi kulasuṇhāhi kuladāsīhi saddhiṃ ekabhājanepi bhuñjanti, ekathālakepi pivanti, ekāsanepi nisīdanti, ekamañcepi tuvaṭṭenti, ekattharaṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, ekapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, ekattharaṇapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, vikālepi bhuñjanti, majjampi pivanti, mālāgandhavilepanampi dhārenti, naccantipi, gāyantipi, vādentipi, lāsentipi;
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.11: naccantiyāpi naccanti, naccantiyāpi gāyanti, naccantiyāpi vādenti, naccantiyāpi lāsenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.13: Lāsentiyāpi naccanti, lāsentiyāpi gāyanti, lāsentiyāpi vādenti, lāsentiyāpi lāsenti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.14: aṭṭhapadepi kīḷanti, dasapadepi kīḷanti, ākāsepi kīḷanti, parihārapathepi kīḷanti, santikāyapi kīḷanti, khalikāyapi kīḷanti, ghaṭikāyapi kīḷanti, salākahatthenapi kīḷanti, akkhenapi kīḷanti, paṅgacīrenapi kīḷanti, vaṅkakenapi kīḷanti, mokkhacikāyapi kīḷanti, ciṅgulakenapi kīḷanti, pattāḷhakenapi kīḷanti, rathakenapi kīḷanti, dhanukenapi kīḷanti, akkharikāyapi kīḷanti, manesikāyapi kīḷanti, yathāvajjenapi kīḷanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.15: hatthismimpi sikkhanti, assasmimpi sikkhanti, rathasmimpi sikkhanti, dhanusmimpi sikkhanti, tharusmimpi sikkhanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.16: hatthissapi purato dhāvanti, assassapi purato dhāvanti, rathassapi purato dhāvantipi ādhāvantipi;
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.18: raṅgamajjhepi saṅghāṭiṃ pattharitvā naccakiṃ evaṃ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.22: Yepi te, bhante, manussā pubbe saddhā ahesuṃ pasannā tepi etarahi assaddhā appasannā.
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.23: Yānipi tāni saṃghassa pubbe dānapathāni tānipi etarahi upacchinnāni.
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.25: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā kīṭāgiriṃ bhikkhū pahiṇeyya, yathāyaṃ kīṭāgirismiṃ āvāso saṇṭhaheyyā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.1: “Evamāvuso”ti kho so bhikkhu tassa upāsakassa paṭissuṇitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena sāvatthi tena pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.2: Anupubbena yena sāvatthi jetavanaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.3: Āciṇṇaṃ kho panetaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammodituṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.4: Atha kho bhagavā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.9: appakilamathena ca ahaṃ, bhante, addhānaṃ āgato.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.10: Idhāhaṃ, bhante, kāsīsu vassaṃvuṭṭho sāvatthiṃ āgacchanto bhagavantaṃ dassanāya yena kīṭāgiri tadavasariṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.11: Atha khvāhaṃ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kīṭāgiriṃ piṇḍāya pāvisiṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.12: Addasā kho maṃ, bhante, aññataro upāsako kīṭāgirismiṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ;
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.13: disvāna yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā maṃ abhivādetvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.17: Atha kho, bhante, so upāsako maṃ gharaṃ netvā bhojetvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.19: ‘Sāvatthiṃ kho ahaṃ, āvuso, gamissāmi bhagavantaṃ dassanāyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.20: ‘Tena hi, bhante, mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vanda, evañca vadehi—
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.22: Assajipunabbasukā nāma kīṭāgirismiṃ āvāsikā alajjino pāpabhikkhū.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.26: Yepi te, bhante, manussā pubbe saddhā ahesuṃ pasannā tepi etarahi assaddhā appasannā.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.27: Yānipi tāni saṃghassa pubbe dānapathāni tānipi etarahi upacchinnāni.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.29: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā kīṭāgiriṃ bhikkhū pahiṇeyya, yathāyaṃ kīṭāgirismiṃ āvāso saṇṭhaheyyā”’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.2: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, assajipunabbasukā nāma kīṭāgirismiṃ āvāsikā alajjino pāpabhikkhū?
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.6: Yepi te manussā pubbe saddhā ahesuṃ pasannā tepi etarahi assaddhā appasannā?
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.7: Yānipi tāni saṃghassa pubbe dānapathāni tānipi etarahi upacchinnāni?
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.12: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā evarūpaṃ anācāraṃ ācarissanti—
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.13: mālāvacchaṃ ropessantipi ropāpessantipi, siñcissantipi siñcāpessantipi, ocinissantipi ocināpessantipi, ganthessantipi ganthāpessantipi, ekatovaṇṭikamālaṃ karissantipi kārāpessantipi, ubhatovaṇṭikamālaṃ karissantipi kārāpessantipi, mañjarikaṃ karissantipi kārāpessantipi, vidhūtikaṃ karissantipi kārāpessantipi, vaṭaṃsakaṃ karissantipi kārāpessantipi, āveḷaṃ karissantipi kārāpessantipi, uracchadaṃ karissantipi kārāpessantipi.
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.14: Te kulitthīnaṃ kuladhītānaṃ kulakumārīnaṃ kulasuṇhānaṃ kuladāsīnaṃ ekatovaṇṭikamālaṃ harissantipi harāpessantipi, ubhatovaṇṭikamālaṃ harissantipi harāpessantipi, mañjarikaṃ harissantipi harāpessantipi, vidhūtikaṃ harissantipi harāpessantipi, vaṭaṃsakaṃ harissantipi harāpessantipi, āveḷaṃ harissantipi harāpessantipi, uracchadaṃ harissantipi harāpessantipi.
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.15: Te kulitthīhi kuladhītāhi kulakumārīhi kulasuṇhāhi kuladāsīhi saddhiṃ ekabhājanepi bhuñjissanti, ekathālakepi pivissanti, ekāsanepi nisīdissanti, ekamañcepi tuvaṭṭissanti, ekattharaṇāpi tuvaṭṭissanti, ekapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭissanti, ekattharaṇapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭissanti, vikālepi bhuñjissanti, majjampi pivissanti, mālāgandhavilepanampi dhāressanti, naccissantipi, gāyissantipi, vādessantipi, lāsessantipi;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.16: naccantiyāpi naccissanti, naccantiyāpi gāyissanti, naccantiyāpi vādessanti, naccantiyāpi lāsessanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.17: gāyantiyāpi naccissanti, gāyantiyāpi gāyissanti, gāyantiyāpi vādessanti, gāyantiyāpi lāsessanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.18: vādentiyāpi naccissanti, vādentiyāpi gāyissanti, vādentiyāpi vādessanti, vādentiyāpi lāsessanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.19: lāsentiyāpi naccissanti, lāsentiyāpi gāyissanti, lāsentiyāpi vādessanti, lāsentiyāpi lāsessanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.20: aṭṭhapadepi kīḷissanti, dasapadepi kīḷissanti, ākāsepi kīḷissanti, parihārapathepi kīḷissanti, santikāyapi kīḷissanti, khalikāyapi kīḷissanti, ghaṭikāyapi kīḷissanti, salākahatthenapi kīḷissanti, akkhenapi kīḷissanti, paṅgacīrenapi kīḷissanti, vaṅkakenapi kīḷissanti mokkhacikāyapi kīḷissanti, ciṅgulakenapi kīḷissanti, pattāḷhakenapi kīḷissanti, rathakenapi kīḷissanti, dhanukenapi kīḷissanti, akkharikāyapi kīḷissanti, manesikāyapi kīḷissanti, yathāvajjenapi kīḷissanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.21: hatthismimpi sikkhissanti, assasmimpi sikkhissanti, rathasmimpi sikkhissanti, dhanusmimpi sikkhissanti, tharusmimpi sikkhissanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.22: hatthissapi purato dhāvissanti, assassapi purato dhāvissanti, rathassapi purato dhāvissantipi ādhāvissantipi;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.24: raṅgamajjhepi saṅghāṭiṃ pattharitvā naccakiṃ evaṃ vakkhanti—
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.31: “gacchatha tumhe, sāriputtā, kīṭāgiriṃ gantvā assajipunabbasukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṃ karotha, tumhākaṃ ete saddhivihārino”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.32: “Kathaṃ mayaṃ, bhante, assajipunabbasukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṃ karoma, caṇḍā te bhikkhū pharusā”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.33: “Tena hi tumhe, sāriputtā, bahukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ gacchathā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.2: paṭhamaṃ assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū codetabbā, codetvā sāretabbā, sāretvā āpattiṃ āropetabbā, āpattiṃ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.5: Imesaṃ pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.6: Kulāni ca imehi duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.7: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho assajipunabbasukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.12: Imesaṃ pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.13: Kulāni ca imehi duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.14: Saṃgho assajipunabbasukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṃ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.16: Yassāyasmato khamati assajipunabbasukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṃ—na assajipunabbasukehi bhikkhūhi kīṭāgirismiṃ vatthabbanti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.22: Imesaṃ pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.23: Kulāni ca imehi duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.24: Saṃgho assajipunabbasukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṃ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.26: Yassāyasmato khamati assajipunabbasukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṃ—na assajipunabbasukehi bhikkhūhi kīṭāgirismiṃ vatthabbanti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.28: Kataṃ saṃghena assajipunabbasukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.30: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.1: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṃ pabbājanīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.2: Asammukhā kataṃ hoti, appaṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, appaṭiññāya kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ pabbājanīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ pabbājanīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.5: Anāpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, desitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.6: acodetvā kataṃ hoti, asāretvā kataṃ hoti, āpattiṃ anāropetvā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.7: asammukhā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.8: appaṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.9: appaṭiññāya kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.10: anāpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.11: adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.12: desitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.13: acodetvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.14: asāretvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.15: āpattiṃ anāropetvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.16: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ pabbājanīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.19: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṃ pabbājanīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.20: Sammukhā kataṃ hoti, paṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, paṭiññāya kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.21: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ pabbājanīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.22: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ pabbājanīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.23: Āpattiyā kataṃ hoti desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti adesitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.24: codetvā kataṃ hoti, sāretvā kataṃ hoti, āpattiṃ āropetvā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.25: sammukhā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.26: paṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.27: paṭiññāya kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.28: āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.29: desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.30: adesitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.31: codetvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.32: sāretvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.33: āpattiṃ āropetvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.34: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ pabbājanīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.37: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.38: Bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.41: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #1
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.42: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.43: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.44: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #2
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.45: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.46: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, saṃghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.47: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #3
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.48: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.49: Kāyikena davena samannāgato hoti, vācasikena davena samannāgato hoti, kāyikavācasikena davena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.50: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #4
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.51: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.52: Kāyikena anācārena samannāgato hoti, vācasikena anācārena samannāgato hoti, kāyikavācasikena anācārena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.53: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #5
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.54: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.55: Kāyikena upaghātikena samannāgato hoti, vācasikena upaghātikena samannāgato hoti, kāyikavācasikena upaghātikena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.56: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #6
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.57: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.58: Kāyikena micchājīvena samannāgato hoti, vācasikena micchājīvena samannāgato hoti, kāyikavācasikena micchājīvena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.1.59: imehi, kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #7
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.1: Tiṇṇaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.2: Eko bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.3: eko bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.5: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #8
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.6: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.7: Eko adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, eko ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, eko atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.8: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #9
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.9: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.10: Eko buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, eko dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, eko saṃghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.11: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #10
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.12: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.13: Eko kāyikena davena samannāgato hoti, eko vācasikena davena samannāgato hoti, eko kāyikavācasikena davena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.14: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #11
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.15: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.16: Eko kāyikena anācārena samannāgato hoti, eko vācasikena anācārena samannāgato hoti, eko kāyikavācasikena anācārena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.17: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #12
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.18: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.19: Eko kāyikena upaghātikena samannāgato hoti, eko vācasikena upaghātikena samannāgato hoti, eko kāyikavācasikena upaghātikena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.20: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #13
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.21: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.22: Eko kāyikena micchājīvena samannāgato hoti, eko vācasikena micchājīvena samannāgato hoti, eko kāyikavācasikena micchājīvena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.23: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #14
pli-tv-kd11:15.1.8: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena pabbājanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.1: Atha kho sāriputtamoggallānappamukho bhikkhusaṃgho kīṭāgiriṃ gantvā assajipunabbasukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṃ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.3: Te saṃghena pabbājanīyakammakatā na sammā vattanti, na lomaṃ pātenti, na netthāraṃ vattanti;
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.8: “kathañhi nāma assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū saṃghena pabbājanīyakammakatā na sammā vattissanti, na lomaṃ pātessanti, na netthāraṃ vattissanti;
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.12: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.13: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.14: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū saṃghena pabbājanīyakammakatā na sammā vattanti, na lomaṃ pātenti, na netthāraṃ vattanti;
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.21: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā saṃghena pabbājanīyakammakatā na sammā vattissanti, na lomaṃ pātessanti, na netthāraṃ vattissanti;
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.2: Upasampādeti, nissayaṃ deti, sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, bhikkhunovādakasammutiṃ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.5: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena pabbājanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti taṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, aññaṃ vā tādisikaṃ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ;
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.8: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.9: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṃ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṃ karoti, anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṃ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.10: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.13: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.14: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṃ deti, na sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, na bhikkhunovādakasammutiṃ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo na ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.15: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.16: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.17: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena pabbājanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti taṃ āpattiṃ na āpajjati, aññaṃ vā tādisikaṃ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ;
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.18: kammaṃ na garahati, kammike na garahati—
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.19: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.20: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.21: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṃ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṃ karoti, na anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṃ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.22: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:17.1.2: Tena, bhikkhave, pabbājanīyakammakatena bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:17.1.3: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, saṃghena pabbājanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṃ pātemi, netthāraṃ vattāmi, pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.2: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu saṃghena pabbājanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.3: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambheyya.
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.6: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu saṃghena pabbājanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.8: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.13: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu saṃghena pabbājanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.15: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.18: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sudhammo macchikāsaṇḍe cittassa gahapatino āvāsiko hoti, navakammiko dhuvabhattiko.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.2: Yadā citto gahapati saṃghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā puggalaṃ vā nimantetukāmo hoti tadā na āyasmantaṃ sudhammaṃ anapaloketvā saṃghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā puggalaṃ vā nimanteti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā therā bhikkhū, āyasmā ca sāriputto, āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno, āyasmā ca mahākaccāno, āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko, āyasmā ca mahākappino, āyasmā ca mahācundo, āyasmā ca anuruddho, āyasmā ca revato, āyasmā ca upāli, āyasmā ca ānando, āyasmā ca rāhulo, kāsīsu cārikaṃ caramānā yena macchikāsaṇḍo tadavasaruṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.4: Assosi kho citto gahapati therā kira bhikkhū macchikāsaṇḍaṃ anuppattāti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.5: Atha kho citto gahapati yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho cittaṃ gahapatiṃ āyasmā sāriputto dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.7: Atha kho citto gahapati āyasmatā sāriputtena dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito there bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.1: Atha kho citto gahapati therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā yenāyasmā sudhammo tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ sudhammaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.2: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṃ sudhammaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.3: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, ayyo sudhammo svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ therehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.5: “pubbe khvāyaṃ citto gahapati yadā saṃghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā puggalaṃ vā nimantetukāmo na maṃ anapaloketvā saṃghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā puggalaṃ vā nimanteti;
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.6: sodāni maṃ anapaloketvā there bhikkhū nimantesi;
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.7: duṭṭhodānāyaṃ citto gahapati anapekkho virattarūpo mayī”ti cittaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.10: tatiyampi kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṃ sudhammaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.11: “adhivāsetu me, bhante, ayyo sudhammo svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ therehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.14: “kiṃ me karissati ayyo sudhammo adhivāsento vā anadhivāsento vā”ti āyasmantaṃ sudhammaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.1: Atha kho citto gahapati tassā rattiyā accayena therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpesi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.3: “yannūnāhaṃ cittassa gahapatino therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭiyattaṃ passeyyan”ti pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena cittassa gahapatino nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.4: Atha kho citto gahapati yenāyasmā sudhammo tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ sudhammaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho cittaṃ gahapatiṃ āyasmā sudhammo etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.6: “pahūtaṃ kho te idaṃ, gahapati, khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyattaṃ;
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.7: ekā ca kho idha natthi yadidaṃ tilasaṃguḷikā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.8: “Bahumhi vata, bhante, ratane buddhavacane vijjamāne ayyena sudhammena yadeva kiñci bhāsitaṃ yadidaṃ tilasaṃguḷikāti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.9: Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhante, dakkhiṇāpathakā vāṇijā puratthimaṃ janapadaṃ agamaṃsu vāṇijjāya.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.11: Atha kho sā, bhante, kukkuṭī kākena saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappesi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.13: Yadā kho so, bhante, kukkuṭapotako kākavassaṃ vassitukāmo hoti, kākakukkuṭīti vassati;
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.14: yadā kukkuṭivassaṃ vassitukāmo hoti, kukkuṭikākāti vassati.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.15: Evameva kho, bhante, bahumhi ratane buddhavacane vijjamāne ayyena sudhammena yadeva kiñci bhāsitaṃ yadidaṃ tilasaṃguḷikā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.4.1: “Akkosasi maṃ tvaṃ, gahapati, paribhāsasi maṃ tvaṃ, gahapati.
pli-tv-kd11:18.4.8: tatiyampi kho āyasmā sudhammo cittaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.4.9: “akkosasi maṃ tvaṃ, gahapati, paribhāsasi maṃ tvaṃ, gahapati.
pli-tv-kd11:18.4.12: “Sāvatthiṃ kho ahaṃ, gahapati, gamissāmi bhagavantaṃ dassanāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.4.13: “Tena hi, bhante, yañca attanā bhaṇitaṃ, yañca mayā bhaṇitaṃ taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocehi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.4.14: Anacchariyaṃ kho panetaṃ, bhante, yaṃ ayyo sudhammo punadeva macchikāsaṇḍaṃ paccāgaccheyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.5.1: Atha kho āyasmā sudhammo senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sāvatthi tena pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.5.2: Anupubbena yena sāvatthi jetavanaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.5.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā sudhammo yañca attanā bhaṇitaṃ yañca cittena gahapatinā bhaṇitaṃ taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.5.5: “ananucchavikaṃ, moghapurisa, ananulomikaṃ appatirūpaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ akappiyaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:18.5.6: Kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, cittaṃ gahapatiṃ saddhaṃ pasannaṃ dāyakaṃ kārakaṃ saṃghupaṭṭhākaṃ hīnena khuṃsessasi, hīnena vambhessasi?
pli-tv-kd11:18.5.10: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ karotu—
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.2: paṭhamaṃ sudhammo bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṃ āropetabbo, āpattiṃ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.4: Ayaṃ sudhammo bhikkhu cittaṃ gahapatiṃ saddhaṃ pasannaṃ dāyakaṃ kārakaṃ saṃghupaṭṭhākaṃ hīnena khuṃseti, hīnena vambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.5: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.9: Ayaṃ sudhammo bhikkhu cittaṃ gahapatiṃ saddhaṃ pasannaṃ dāyakaṃ kārakaṃ saṃghupaṭṭhākaṃ hīnena khuṃseti, hīnena vambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.12: Yassāyasmato khamati sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa karaṇaṃ—citto te gahapati khamāpetabboti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.17: Ayaṃ sudhammo bhikkhu cittaṃ gahapatiṃ saddhaṃ pasannaṃ dāyakaṃ kārakaṃ saṃghupaṭṭhākaṃ hīnena khuṃseti, hīnena vambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.20: Yassāyasmato khamati sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa karaṇaṃ—citto te gahapati khamāpetabboti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.24: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṃ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.2: Asammukhā kataṃ hoti, appaṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, appaṭiññāya kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.5: Anāpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, desitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.6: acodetvā kataṃ hoti, asāretvā kataṃ hoti, āpattiṃ anāropetvā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.7: asammukhā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.8: appaṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.9: appaṭiññāya kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.10: anāpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.11: adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.12: desitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.13: acodetvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.14: asāretvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.15: āpattiṃ anāropetvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.16: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.19: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṃ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.20: Sammukhā kataṃ hoti, paṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, paṭiññāya kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.21: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.22: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.23: Āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adesitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.24: codetvā kataṃ hoti, sāretvā kataṃ hoti, āpattiṃ āropetvā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.25: sammukhā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.26: paṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.27: paṭiññāya kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.28: āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.29: desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.30: adesitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.31: codetvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.32: sāretvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.33: āpattiṃ āropetvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.34: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.2: Gihīnaṃ alābhāya parisakkati, gihīnaṃ anatthāya parisakkati, gihīnaṃ anāvāsāya parisakkati, gihī akkosati paribhāsati, gihī gihīhi bhedeti—
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kareyya. #1
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.5: Gihīnaṃ buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, gihīnaṃ dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, gihīnaṃ saṃghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, gihī hīnena khuṃseti hīnena vambheti, gihīnaṃ dhammikaṃ paṭissavaṃ na saccāpeti—
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.6: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kareyya. #2
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.7: Pañcannaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.8: Eko gihīnaṃ alābhāya parisakkati, eko gihīnaṃ anatthāya parisakkati, eko gihīnaṃ anāvāsāya parisakkati, eko gihī akkosati paribhāsati, eko gihī gihīhi bhedeti—
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.9: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kareyya. #3
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.10: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.11: Eko gihīnaṃ buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, eko gihīnaṃ dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, eko gihīnaṃ saṃghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, eko gihī hīnena khuṃseti hīnena vambheti, eko gihīnaṃ dhammikaṃ paṭissavaṃ na saccāpeti—
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.12: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kareyya. #4
pli-tv-kd11:21.1.8: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:22.1.1: Atha kho saṃgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd11:22.1.3: So saṃghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato macchikāsaṇḍaṃ gantvā maṅkubhūto nāsakkhi cittaṃ gahapatiṃ khamāpetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:22.1.7: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, macchikāsaṇḍaṃ gantvā maṅkubhūto nāsakkhiṃ cittaṃ gahapatiṃ khamāpetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.1: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno anudūtaṃ detu—
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.4: paṭhamaṃ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.6: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ sudhammassa bhikkhuno anudūtaṃ dadeyya cittaṃ gahapatiṃ khamāpetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.9: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ sudhammassa bhikkhuno anudūtaṃ deti cittaṃ gahapatiṃ khamāpetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.10: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sudhammassa bhikkhuno anudūtassa dānaṃ cittaṃ gahapatiṃ khamāpetuṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.12: Dinno saṃghena itthannāmo bhikkhu sudhammassa bhikkhuno anudūto cittaṃ gahapatiṃ khamāpetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.13: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.1: Tena, bhikkhave, sudhammena bhikkhunā anudūtena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ macchikāsaṇḍaṃ gantvā citto gahapati khamāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.4: No ce khamati, anudūtena bhikkhunā vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.7: No ce khamati, anudūtena bhikkhunā vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.8: ‘khama, gahapati, imassa bhikkhuno, ahaṃ taṃ pasādemī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.10: No ce khamati, anudūtena bhikkhunā vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.13: No ce khamati, anudūtena bhikkhunā sudhammo bhikkhu cittassa gahapatino dassanūpacāraṃ avijahāpetvā savanūpacāraṃ avijahāpetvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kārāpetvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṃ paggaṇhāpetvā taṃ āpattiṃ desāpetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:23.1.1: Atha kho āyasmā sudhammo anudūtena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ macchikāsaṇḍaṃ gantvā cittaṃ gahapatiṃ khamāpesi.
pli-tv-kd11:23.1.2: So sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd11:23.1.3: “ahaṃ, āvuso, saṃghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṃ pātemi, netthāraṃ vattāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:23.1.6: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetu.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.2: Upasampādeti, nissayaṃ deti, sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, bhikkhunovādakasammutiṃ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.5: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti taṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, aññaṃ vā tādisikaṃ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ;
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.8: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.9: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṃ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṃ karoti, anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṃ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.10: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.13: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.14: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṃ deti, na sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, na bhikkhunovādakasammutiṃ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo na ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.15: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.16: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.17: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti taṃ āpattiṃ na āpajjati, aññaṃ vā tādisikaṃ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ;
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.18: kammaṃ na garahati, kammike na garahati—
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.19: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.20: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.21: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṃ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṃ karoti, na anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṃ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.22: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.2: Tena, bhikkhave, sudhammena bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.3: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, saṃghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṃ pātemi, netthāraṃ vattāmi, paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.8: Ayaṃ sudhammo bhikkhu saṃghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.9: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ paṭippassambheyya.
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.12: Ayaṃ sudhammo bhikkhu saṃghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.14: Yassāyasmato khamati sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.19: Ayaṃ sudhammo bhikkhu saṃghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.21: Yassāyasmato khamati sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.24: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṃ passituṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.3: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.4: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchissati āpattiṃ passitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.6: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.7: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, channo bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṃ passitun”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.11: kathañhi nāma so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchissati āpattiṃ passituṃ?
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.15: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ karotu—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.2: paṭhamaṃ channo bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṃ āropetabbo, āpattiṃ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.4: Ayaṃ channo bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṃ passituṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.5: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.9: Ayaṃ channo bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṃ passituṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.10: Saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.12: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.18: Ayaṃ channo bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṃ passituṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.19: Saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.21: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.24: Kataṃ saṃghena channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.26: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṃ, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.2: Asammukhā kataṃ hoti, appaṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, appaṭiññāya kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.5: Anāpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, desitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.6: acodetvā kataṃ hoti, asāretvā kataṃ hoti, āpattiṃ anāropetvā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.7: asammukhā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.8: appaṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.9: appaṭiññāya kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.10: anāpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.11: adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.12: desitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.13: acodetvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.14: asāretvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.15: āpattiṃ anāropetvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.16: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.19: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṃ, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.20: Sammukhā kataṃ hoti, paṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, paṭiññāya kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.21: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.23: Āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adesitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.24: codetvā kataṃ hoti, sāretvā kataṃ hoti, āpattiṃ āropetvā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.25: sammukhā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.26: paṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.27: paṭiññāya kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.28: āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.29: desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.30: adesitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.31: codetvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.32: sāretvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.33: āpattiṃ āropetvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.34: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.37: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.38: Bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.41: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.42: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.43: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.44: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.45: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.46: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, saṃghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.47: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.48: Tiṇṇaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.49: Eko bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.50: eko bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.52: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.53: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.54: Eko adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, eko ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, eko atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.55: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.56: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.57: Eko buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, eko dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, eko saṃghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.58: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:27.1.1: Āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammakatena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā sammā vattitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:27.1.10: ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā, aññā vā tādisikā, tato vā pāpiṭṭhatarā;
pli-tv-kd11:27.1.33: Na pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vatthabbaṃ,
pli-tv-kd11:27.1.35: na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vatthabbaṃ,
pli-tv-kd11:27.1.37: na pakatatto bhikkhu āsādetabbo anto vā bahi vā.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.1: Atha kho saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.3: So saṃghena, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammakato tamhā āvāsā aññaṃ āvāsaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.4: Tattha bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṃ, na paccuṭṭhesuṃ, na añjalikammaṃ na sāmīcikammaṃ akaṃsu, na sakkariṃsu, na garuṃ kariṃsu, na mānesuṃ, na pūjesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.5: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato tamhāpi āvāsā aññaṃ āvāsaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.6: Tatthapi bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṃ, na paccuṭṭhesuṃ, na añjalikammaṃ na sāmīcikammaṃ akaṃsu, na sakkariṃsu, na garuṃ kariṃsu, na mānesuṃ, na pūjesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.7: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato tamhāpi āvāsā aññaṃ āvāsaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.8: Tatthapi bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṃ, na paccuṭṭhesuṃ, na añjalikammaṃ na sāmīcikammaṃ akaṃsu, na sakkariṃsu, na garuṃ kariṃsu, na mānesuṃ, na pūjesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.9: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato punadeva kosambiṃ paccāgañchi.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.10: So sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.11: “ahaṃ, āvuso, saṃghena, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṃ pātemi, netthāraṃ vattāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.14: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetu.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.2: Upasampādeti, nissayaṃ deti, sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, bhikkhunovādakasammutiṃ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ. #5
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.5: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti taṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, aññaṃ vā tādisikaṃ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ;
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ. #10
