pli-tv-kd11:28.2.8: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.9: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ, paccuṭṭhānaṃ, añjalikammaṃ, sāmīcikammaṃ, āsanābhihāraṃ sādiyati—
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.10: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ. #15
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.11: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.12: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno seyyābhihāraṃ, pādodakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ, pādakathalikaṃ, pattacīvarappaṭiggahaṇaṃ, nahāne piṭṭhiparikammaṃ sādiyati—
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.13: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ. #20
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.14: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.15: Pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, ācāravipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, diṭṭhivipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, ājīvavipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, bhikkhuṃ bhikkhūhi bhedeti—
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.16: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ. #25
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.17: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.18: Gihiddhajaṃ dhāreti, titthiyaddhajaṃ dhāreti, titthiye sevati;
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.19: bhikkhū na sevati, bhikkhusikkhāya na sikkhati—
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.20: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ. #30
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.21: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.22: Pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vasati, ekacchanne anāvāse vasati, ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vasati;
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.23: pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā āsanā na vuṭṭhāti;
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.24: pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ āsādeti anto vā bahi vā—
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.25: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ. #35
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.26: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.27: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṃ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṃ karoti, anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṃ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.28: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ. #43
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.2: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṃ deti, na sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, na bhikkhunovādakasammutiṃ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo na ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ. #5
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.5: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti taṃ āpattiṃ na āpajjati, aññaṃ vā tādisikaṃ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ;
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.6: kammaṃ na garahati, kammike na garahati—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ. #10
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.8: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.9: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ, paccuṭṭhānaṃ, añjalikammaṃ, sāmīcikammaṃ, āsanābhihāraṃ sādiyati—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.10: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ. #15
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.11: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.12: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno seyyābhihāraṃ, pādodakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ, pādakathalikaṃ, pattacīvarappaṭiggahaṇaṃ, nahāne piṭṭhiparikammaṃ sādiyati—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.13: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ. #20
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.14: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.15: Na pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, na ācāravipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, na diṭṭhivipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, na ājīvavipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, na bhikkhuṃ bhikkhūhi bhedeti—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.16: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ. #25
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.17: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.18: Na gihiddhajaṃ dhāreti, na titthiyaddhajaṃ dhāreti, na titthiye sevati, bhikkhū sevati, bhikkhusikkhāya sikkhati—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.19: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ. #30
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.20: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.21: Na pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vasati, na ekacchanne anāvāse vasati, na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vasati, pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā āsanā vuṭṭhāti, na pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ āsādeti anto vā bahi vā—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.22: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ. #35
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.23: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.24: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṃ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṃ karoti, na anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṃ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.25: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ. #43
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.2: Tena, bhikkhave, channena bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.3: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, saṃghena, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṃ pātemi, netthāraṃ vattāmi, āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.8: Ayaṃ channo bhikkhu saṃghena, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.9: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambheyya.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.12: Ayaṃ channo bhikkhu saṃghena, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.13: Saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.14: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.19: Ayaṃ channo bhikkhu saṃghena, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.20: Saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.21: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.23: Paṭippassaddhaṃ saṃghena channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.24: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṃ paṭikātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.3: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.4: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchissati āpattiṃ paṭikātun”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.6: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.7: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, channo bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṃ paṭikātun”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.11: kathañhi nāma so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchissati āpattiṃ paṭikātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.15: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ karotu—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.18: paṭhamaṃ channo bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṃ āropetabbo, āpattiṃ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.20: Ayaṃ channo bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṃ paṭikātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.21: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.25: Ayaṃ channo bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṃ paṭikātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.26: Saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.28: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.34: Ayaṃ channo bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṃ paṭikātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.35: Saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.37: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.40: Kataṃ saṃghena channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.42: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.47: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṃ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.48: Asammukhā kataṃ hoti, appaṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, appaṭiññāya kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.49: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.50: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.51: Anāpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, desitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.52: acodetvā kataṃ hoti, asāretvā kataṃ hoti, āpattiṃ anāropetvā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.53: asammukhā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.54: appaṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.55: appaṭiññāya kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.56: anāpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.57: adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.58: desitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.59: acodetvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.60: asāretvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.61: āpattiṃ anāropetvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.62: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.65: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṃ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.66: Sammukhā kataṃ hoti, paṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, paṭiññāya kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.67: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.68: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.69: Āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adesitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.70: codetvā kataṃ hoti, sāretvā kataṃ hoti, āpattiṃ āropetvā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.71: sammukhā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.72: paṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.73: paṭiññāya kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.74: āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.75: desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.76: adesitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.77: codetvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.78: sāretvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.79: āpattiṃ āropetvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.80: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.83: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.84: Bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.87: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.88: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.89: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.90: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.91: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.92: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, saṃghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.93: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.94: Tiṇṇaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.95: Eko bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.96: eko bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.98: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.99: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.100: Eko adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, eko ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, eko atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.101: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.102: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.103: Eko buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, eko dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, eko saṃghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.104: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.107: Āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammakatena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā sammā vattitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.114: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.139: Na pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vatthabbaṃ,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.141: na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vatthabbaṃ,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.143: na pakatatto bhikkhu āsādetabbo anto vā bahi vā.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.153: Atha kho saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.155: So saṃghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammakato tamhā āvāsā aññaṃ āvāsaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.156: Tattha bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṃ, na paccuṭṭhesuṃ, na añjalikammaṃ na sāmīcikammaṃ akaṃsu, na sakkariṃsu, na garuṃ kariṃsu, na mānesuṃ, na pūjesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.157: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato tamhāpi āvāsā aññaṃ āvāsaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.158: Tatthapi bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṃ, na paccuṭṭhesuṃ, na añjalikammaṃ na sāmīcikammaṃ akaṃsu, na sakkariṃsu, na garuṃ kariṃsu, na mānesuṃ, na pūjesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.159: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato tamhāpi āvāsā aññaṃ āvāsaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.160: Tatthapi bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṃ, na paccuṭṭhesuṃ, na añjalikammaṃ na sāmīcikammaṃ akaṃsu, na sakkariṃsu, na garuṃ kariṃsu, na mānesuṃ, na pūjesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.161: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato punadeva kosambiṃ paccāgañchi.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.162: So sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.163: “ahaṃ, āvuso, saṃghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṃ pātemi, netthāraṃ vattāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.166: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetu.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.168: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.169: Upasampādeti, nissayaṃ deti, sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, bhikkhunovādakasammutiṃ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.170: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.171: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.172: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti taṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, aññaṃ vā tādisikaṃ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.174: pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ, paccuṭṭhānaṃ, añjalikammaṃ, sāmīcikammaṃ, āsanābhihāraṃ sādiyati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.175: pakatattassa bhikkhuno seyyābhihāraṃ, pādodakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ, pādakathalikaṃ, pattacīvarappaṭiggahaṇaṃ, nahāne piṭṭhiparikammaṃ sādiyati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.176: pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, ācāravipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, diṭṭhivipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, ājīvavipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, bhikkhuṃ bhikkhūhi bhedeti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.177: gihiddhajaṃ dhāreti, titthiyaddhajaṃ dhāreti, titthiye sevati, bhikkhū na sevati, bhikkhusikkhāya na sikkhati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.178: pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vasati, ekacchanne anāvāse vasati, ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vasati, pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā āsanā na vuṭṭhāti, pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ āsādeti anto vā bahi vā—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.179: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.180: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.181: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṃ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṃ karoti, anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṃ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.182: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.185: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.186: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṃ deti, na sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, na bhikkhunovādakasammutiṃ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo na ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.187: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.188: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.189: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti taṃ āpattiṃ na āpajjati, aññaṃ vā tādisikaṃ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.190: kammaṃ na garahati, kammike na garahati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.191: na pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ, paccuṭṭhānaṃ, añjalikammaṃ, sāmīcikammaṃ, āsanābhihāraṃ sādiyati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.192: na pakatattassa bhikkhuno seyyābhihāraṃ, pādodakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ, pādakathalikaṃ, pattacīvarappaṭiggahaṇaṃ, nahāne piṭṭhiparikammaṃ sādiyati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.193: na pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, na ācāravipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, na diṭṭhivipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, na ājīvavipattiyā anuddhaṃseti, na bhikkhuṃ bhikkhūhi bhedeti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.194: na gihiddhajaṃ dhāreti, na titthiyaddhajaṃ dhāreti, na titthiye sevati, bhikkhū sevati, bhikkhusikkhāya sikkhati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.195: na pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vasati, na ekacchanne anāvāse vasati, na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vasati, pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā āsanā vuṭṭhāti, na pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ āsādeti anto vā bahi vā—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.196: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.197: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.198: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṃ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṃ karoti, na anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṃ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.199: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.202: Tena bhikkhave, channena bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.203: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, saṃghena āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṃ pātemi, netthāraṃ vattāmi, āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.208: Ayaṃ channo bhikkhu saṃghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.209: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambheyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.212: Ayaṃ channo bhikkhu saṃghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.213: Saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.214: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.219: Ayaṃ channo bhikkhu saṃghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.220: Saṃgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.221: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.223: Paṭippassaddhaṃ saṃghena channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.224: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ariṭṭhassa nāma bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.3: “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.4: Assosuṃ kho sambahulā bhikkhū ariṭṭhassa nāma kira bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.5: “Tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū yena ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.8: “saccaṃ kira te, āvuso ariṭṭha, evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.9: tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.10: “Evaṃ byā kho ahaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.2.5: Anekapariyāyenāvuso ariṭṭha, antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā.
pli-tv-kd11:32.2.7: Appassādā kāmā vuttā bhagavatā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-kd11:32.2.8: Aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā kāmā vuttā bhagavatā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-kd11:32.2.17: sappasirūpamā kāmā vuttā bhagavatā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.2.18: Evampi kho ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo tehi bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ thāmasā parāmāsā abhinivissa voharati—
pli-tv-kd11:32.2.19: “evaṃ byā kho ahaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.1: Yato ca kho te bhikkhū nāsakkhiṃsu ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ etasmā pāpakā diṭṭhigatā vivecetuṃ, atha kho te bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.2: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.3: “saccaṃ kira te, ariṭṭha, evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.4: tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.5: “Evaṃ byā kho ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.6: “Kassa nu kho nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, mayā evaṃ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsi?
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.7: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā?
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.9: Appassādā kāmā vuttā mayā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.10: Aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā kāmā vuttā mayā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.19: sappasirūpamā kāmā vuttā mayā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.20: Atha ca pana tvaṃ, moghapurisa, attanā duggahitena amhe ceva abbhācikkhasi, attānañca khaṇasi, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavasi.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.21: Tañhi te, moghapurisa, bhavissati dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.25: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ karotu—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.2: paṭhamaṃ ariṭṭho bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṃ āropetabbo, āpattiṃ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.4: Ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.5: tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyāti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.7: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.11: Ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.12: tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyāti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.14: Saṃgho ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.16: Yassāyasmato khamati ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.22: Ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.23: tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyāti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.25: Saṃgho ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.27: Yassāyasmato khamati ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.30: Kataṃ saṃghena ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.32: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.34: ‘ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo, saṃghena pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.1: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṃ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.2: Asammukhā kataṃ hoti, appaṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, appaṭiññāya kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.5: Anāpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, desitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.6: acodetvā kataṃ hoti, asāretvā kataṃ hoti, āpattiṃ anāropetvā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.7: asammukhā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.8: appaṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.9: appaṭiññāya kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.10: anāpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.11: adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.12: desitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.13: acodetvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.14: asāretvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.15: āpattiṃ anāropetvā kataṃ hoti, adhammena kataṃ hoti, vaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.16: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.17: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakamme adhammakammadvādasakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.19: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṃ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.20: Sammukhā kataṃ hoti, paṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, paṭiññāya kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.21: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.22: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.23: Āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, adesitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.24: codetvā kataṃ hoti, sāretvā kataṃ hoti, āpattiṃ āropetvā kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.25: sammukhā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.26: paṭipucchā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.27: paṭiññāya kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.28: āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.29: desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.30: adesitāya āpattiyā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.31: codetvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.32: sāretvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.33: āpattiṃ āropetvā kataṃ hoti, dhammena kataṃ hoti, samaggena kataṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.34: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.35: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakamme dhammakammadvādasakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.37: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.38: Bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.41: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #1
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.42: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.43: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.44: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #2
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.45: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.46: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, saṃghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.47: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #3
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.48: Tiṇṇaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.49: Eko bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.50: eko bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.52: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #4
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.53: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.54: Eko adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, eko ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, eko atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.55: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #5
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.56: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.57: Eko buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, eko dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, eko saṃghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.58: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissage, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya. #6
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.59: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissage ukkhepanīyakamme ākaṅkhamānachakkaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.61: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammakatena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā sammā vattitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.68: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.81: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakamme tecattālīsavattaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.1: Atha kho saṃgho ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.3: So saṃghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato vibbhami.
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.4: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.5: “kathañhi nāma ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo saṃghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato vibbhamissatī”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.7: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.8: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo saṃghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato vibbhamatī”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.12: kathañhi nāma so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso saṃghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato vibbhamissati?
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.16: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetu.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.2: Upasampādeti, nissayaṃ deti, sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, bhikkhunovādakasammutiṃ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissage, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.4: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.5: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti taṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, aññaṃ vā tādisikaṃ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ;
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ …
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.9: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.10: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṃ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṃ karoti, anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṃ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.11: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ nappaṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.12: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakamme nappaṭippassambhetabbatecattālīsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.14: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.15: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṃ deti, na sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, na bhikkhunovādakasammutiṃ sādiyati, sammatopi bhikkhuniyo na ovadati—
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.16: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.17: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.18: Yāya āpattiyā saṃghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti taṃ āpattiṃ na āpajjati, aññaṃ vā tādisikaṃ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ;
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.19: kammaṃ na garahati, kammike na garahati—
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.20: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ …
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.22: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.23: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṃ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṃ karoti, na anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṃ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.24: imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.25: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakamme paṭippassambhetabbatecattālīsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.2: Tena, bhikkhave, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakatena bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.3: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, saṃghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṃ pātemi, netthāraṃ vattāmi, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.8: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu saṃghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.9: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambheyya.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.12: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu saṃghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.13: Saṃgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.14: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.19: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu saṃghena, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.20: Saṃgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.21: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.23: Paṭippassaddhaṃ saṃghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge, ukkhepanīyakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.24: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.25: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ sattamaṃ.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.26: Kammakkhandhako paṭhamo. Imamhi khandhake vatthū satta.
